title: Open Ocean Hub not working on windows client
body:
The Open Ocean Hub is currently available on the OCE client but it is currently not displaying any information. I've linked an image of what appears when I attempt to access the 'hub'. I have restarted the client to no success. Hopefully someone notices and I'm the only one with this problem.
http://i.imgur.com/ex3yFB7.png
Specs:
Windows 10 Pro
Intel i5-4460
8gb RAM
R9-280x
Directx 12

replies.body:
Hi folks,

We were working on a couple of issues with this panel last night, around when you posted this thread.

Can you confirm if this is still an issue for you?

Cheers
Mindstar
Late reply but it is fixed now :)
Mine does the same thing, dont know whats wrong with it

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=NQc6kyMP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-22T22:10:21.311+0000)
>
> Hey kobeblue,
> 
> I'm sorry to hear that you're having issues accessing the Ocean Hub. First, can you try the solution provided in [**this Riot Games Support article**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753044-Store-Error-Store-appears-blank-black-or-empty)? If that doesn't work, please try [**repairing your client**](http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/1?view=article). Keep me updated!

Give these solutions a shot, and let me know if anything works. Cheers!

Hey kobeblue,

I'm sorry to hear that you're having issues accessing the Ocean Hub. First, can you try the solution provided in [**this Riot Games Support article**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753044-Store-Error-Store-appears-blank-black-or-empty)? If that doesn't work, please try [**repairing your client**](http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/1?view=article). Keep me updated!
